MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:54am. Our engineers have arrived onsite.And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11am. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:51 AM on Monday, 11 January 2021..
